'''Magic Workshop''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|The Magician's Secret}}.

==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|The Magician's Secret|Trial Character}}

==Chests==
* Common Chest &times;1 &mdash; after the cutscene of Lyney opening the secret passageway, in a space in the wall next to the staircase leading upstairs, surrounded by debris.
* Exquisite Chest &times;1 &mdash; up the stairs from the previous chest, in front of the large door; both the chest and the door are unlocked by defeating the second domain's second group of enemies.
* Precious Chest &times;1 &mdash; appears upon completing the dungeon.
